demos.paragraph: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the internal laws of the State of Delaware, without giving effect to any choice or conflict of law provision or rule. Each clause within this Agreement shall be interpreted independently, and the invalidity of one clause shall not affect the enforceability of the remaining provisions. Headings are for convenience only and shall not affect the interpretation of this Agreement. Nothing herein shall be construed as limiting or waiving any rights or obligations under applicable law unless expressly stated.
demos.target_company: The target company is Sullivan & Cromwell LLP.
demos.reasoning: The paragraph discusses the governing law and interpretation of the Agreement but does not mention any specific buyer or seller entities. It also does not reference the target company, Sullivan & Cromwell LLP, indicating that it is not explicitly mentioned in this context.

demos.paragraph: The issuance and sale of the Purchased Shares hereunder will not obligate Athenex, Inc. to issue shares of Common Stock or other securities to any other Person and will not result in the adjustment of the exercise, conversion, exchange or reset price of any outstanding security. The Purchased Shares to be issued and sold by Athenex, Inc. hereunder have been duly authorized and, when issued and delivered and paid for as provided herein, will be duly and validly issued, will be fully paid and non-assessable, and shall be free and clear of Encumbrances other than restrictions on transfer under applicable securities laws.
demos.target_company: The target company is Athenex, Inc.
demos.reasoning: The paragraph explicitly mentions Athenex, Inc. as the entity involved in the issuance and sale of the Purchased Shares. Since the target company is also Athenex, Inc., it confirms that the target company is explicitly mentioned in the paragraph.

demos.paragraph: This ASSET PURCHASE AGREEMENT, dated as of December 17, 2012, is by and between Bella Pictures Holdings, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (the "Company" or "Seller"), and The Pros Entertainment Services, Inc., a Pennsylvania corporation (the "Buyer"). Pursuant to this Agreement, the Company desires to sell to Buyer, and Buyer desires to purchase from the Company, the Purchased Assets, on and subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein.

China Capital Financial LLC ("CCF") is a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company and is a limited liability company duly formed, validly existing and in good standing under the laws of the State of Delaware. China Capital Financial LLC has all requisite power and authority (limited liability company and otherwise) to own, lease and operate its properties and to carry on its Business. CCF is duly qualified to transact business and is in good standing in each jurisdiction in which the failure to so qualify would have a material adverse effect on the business, assets, condition or results of operations of China Capital Financial LLC.
demos.target_company: The target company is China Capital Financial LLC.
